sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Echart titleText="中国现有确诊病例" tooltip="确诊"></Echart>
</template>
<script>

export default {
    name:"MapNow",
    data(){
        return({
           E:''
        })
    },
    mounted(){
        this.getData()
        console.log(option)
        this.E=echart.init(this.$refs.echarts);
        console.log(this.E)
        this.E.setOption(option);
    },
    methods:{
        getData(){
         jsonp('http://interface.sina.cn/news/wap/fymap2020_data.d.json?_=1580892522427',(err,data)=>{
                const lists = data.data.list.map(item=>{
                    return{
                        name:item.name,
                        value:item.econNum
                    }
                })
                console.log(lists)
                console.log(data)
                option.series[0].data=lists
               
                
                this.E.setOption(option); 
         })   
        
            
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
.echart{
    width: 100%;
    height: 600px;
}
</style>
